name: GAME1-(E.G.M.S.)
description:
STORY: the main character used to be a pirate (a hero actually), from year 1200 aD or so; let's call him "X". somehow X time traveled in the this sci-fi place (where the levels take place). obviously X wants to get back home, from his family and daily routine, but, in order to do that, he must find the time machine. after managing to survive in this dangerous world (the levels represent the futuristic Earth which is about to fall apart), he finds a guy, named Y, who claims that he summoned X from the past because he wanted this hero to complete a mission: save the world. Y chose X because he was well known thanks to his huge bravery, and Y claims that only a person like X can help him save the world from its terrible destiny. eventually X finally discovers that Y is a liar, and that he kidnapped a scientist (Z) to rescue X and make him do bad actions to achieve his goal (most likely finding keys to allow Y to take control of all the population). X will go on his way to find out where Y hidden Z; once he'll discovers it, he will ask Z to bring him back home. although he doesn't know what is waiting for him in his years... (and here there is the possibility to make a new game, like the sequel)

 

CONTROLS: 

a: move left 

d: move right 

w: dash towards mouse 

shift: crouch 

right click: shoot arrows towards mouse (not much useful atm) 

left click: drag draggable objects (red rectangles that turn green if u can grab em)

left click: interact with buttons like pause/resume/restart the game

 

GOAL: rn the goal is to collect as many coins as possible in the fastest time possible and reach the finish line (a green tick atm). the objective although will then be to complete the level with the more points possible and to discover a piece of the story; points will be given thanks to some hard calculations which will involve coins taken, things discovered, time used, number of deaths and so on.

things missing: we will add swords, bow, enemies, story, music, animations, better art, sfx, hud, menus, more platforms, fix bugs and so on

CREDITS

Managment: ivan lee, fanti. Music: eric bowman. Art: qonus, fanti. Code: fanti, qonus, aditya... Story: artistify, fanti
